member.name: DUPLICATE_EXTENTS_DATA
member.summary: Contains parameters for the FSCTL_DUPLICATE_EXTENTS control code that performs the Block Cloning operation.

member.name: DUPLICATE_EXTENTS_DATA.FileHandle
member.summary: A handle to the source file from which the byte range is to be copied. To retrieve a file handle, use the function.

member.name: DUPLICATE_EXTENTS_DATA.SourceFileOffset
member.summary: The offset, in bytes, to the beginning of the range to copy from the source file.

member.name: DUPLICATE_EXTENTS_DATA.TargetFileOffset
member.summary: The offset, in bytes, to place the copied byte range in the destination file.

member.name: DUPLICATE_EXTENTS_DATA.ByteCount
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of the range to copy.
